message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal for the value it provides.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only justify a purchase price of $10,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  While that price doesn't quite work for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,250. I believe this price represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering our positions, I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for the product. I hope this offers a reasonable compromise that respects both our values.
